pageContext.title: Documenting the Now: Supporting Scholarly Use and Preservation of Social Media Content
pageContext.description_excerpt: Documenting the Now responds to the public's use of social media for chronicling historically significant events as well as demand from scholars and archivists seeking a user-friendly means of collecting and preserving digital content.
pageContext.project_directors: Trevor Muñoz, Bergis Jules, Meredith Clark
pageContext.participants: Bergis Jules, Ed Summers, Meredith Clark, Trevor Muñoz
